<|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|> Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023 Write an Opta-style tweet about the following:<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|> The Dutch national team (@OnsOranje) recently fielded a lineup that featured a unique occurrence in their recent history. For the first time since November 11, 2013, three players from the same non-Dutch club were included in the starting eleven. This time, it was Virgil van Dijk, Ryan Gravenberch, and Cody Gakpo, all representing Liverpool. The last time this happened was over a decade ago when Michel Vorm, Dwight Tiendalli, and Jonathan de Guzmán, all from Swansea City, played against China.<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|> 3 - This is the first @OnsOranje game with three players representing the same non-Dutch club side (Virgil van Dijk, Ryan Gravenberch and Cody Gakpo for Liverpool) since 11 November 2013 (Michel Vorm, Dwight Tiendalli and Jonathan de Guzmán for Swansea City against China).
